trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event is raised before a Web Parts control is added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> evento se desencadena antes de que se agrega un control de elementos Web a una zona de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: You can specify which Web Parts controls can be added to a zone by customizing how the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: Puede especificar qué partes de Web pueden agregarse controles a una zona mediante la personalización de cómo se controla el evento.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler> delegate is called when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: El método especificado en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler> delegado se llama cuando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> evento se desencadena.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores de páginas pueden proporcionar controladores personalizados para los eventos de elementos Web agregando un `OnAuthorizeWebPart` atribuir a la `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento en una página y asignarle un nombre de método personalizado al atributo.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: También puede asignar un controlador personalizado mediante programación.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de la asignación mediante programación un controlador de eventos, vea [NIB: Cómo: conectar métodos de controlador de eventos a eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
